vote.title: Authorize five subrecipient agreements for making food accessible services with (1) Citizens Development Center dba Achieve in the amount of $90,000.00; (2) CitySquare in the amount of $127,469.00; (3) First Presbyterian Church of Dallas, Texas dba The Stewpot in the amount of $105,928.00; (4) Services of Hope Entities, Inc. in the amount of $388,903.00; and (5) The Visiting Nurse Association of Texas in the amount of $137,700.00, for the period September 1, 2020 (or upon contract execution) through December 31, 2020 - Total not to exceed $850,000.00 - Financing: U.S. Department of Treasury Coronavirus Relief Funds
vote.description: Authorize five subrecipient agreements for making food accessible services with (1) Citizens Development Center dba Achieve in the amount of $90,000.00; (2) CitySquare in the amount of $127,469.00; (3) First Presbyterian Church of Dallas, Texas dba The Stewpot in the amount of $105,928.00; (4) Services of Hope Entities, Inc. in the amount of $388,903.00; and (5) The Visiting Nurse Association of Texas in the amount of $137,700.00, for the period September 1, 2020 (or upon contract execution) through December 31, 2020 - Total not to exceed $850,000.00 - Financing: U.S. Department of Treasury Coronavirus Relief Funds
